page.title: 13LIFE STYLES:INTERVIEW
page.content:
{MR.P STONE}HAS LIVED IN THE{FLEET AREA ALMOST FIFTY YEARS.HE LIVES ON {CHICKERELL ROAD}JUST OUTSIDE {CHICKERELL VILLAGE.}LIFE IS LESS PEACEFUL TODAY BECAUSE THERE ARE MORE CARS AND LORRIES, BUT YEARS AGO THERE WERE ONLY HORSE DRAWN CARTS. THE{POST {OFFICE}HAS CHANGED BECAUSE MORE OLD AGED PENSIONERS USE IT MORE THAN
BEFORE. HE DOESN'T LIKE THE NEW BUILDINGS GOING ON IN THE VILLAGE BECAUSE THEY ARE NOT THE SAME AS THE AS THE OLD ONES. THE GREATEST CHANGE IS THE MAIN DRAINAGE. THE OLD FASHIONED TOILETS WERE SIMPLY A WOODEN HUT AT THE BOTTOM OF HE GARDEN. INSIDE WAS A BUCKET WHICH THEY USED FOR A TOILET. EVERY WEEK THE HEAD OF THE FAMILY USED TO PUT IT ON THE DUNG HEAP TO USE FOR MANURE.
